short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebRTC based P2P HQ/HD screen sharing. Share audio+tab or any application's screen. Even share full/entire screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows a user on Usppa.Live to share their screen with other users on the Usppa Video Connector
